website_summaries.verdict: With a sleek design, long warranty, and battery-powered motion sensor with a high degree of reliability, it's an impressive investment for your home or office.
pros: User-friendly features including space-saving semi-round shape, smooth open/close gear system, and liner pocket that holds extra bags outpace the competitors
cons: The costliest model on our list
A few reports of malfunctions, but the warranty provides peace of mind

customer_reviews.title: Defective within an hour...
customer_reviews.text: Can stopped working within an hour of unboxing. Thought it might have been the batteries so replaced them with fresh ones. Still the sensor and lid will not function correctly and will not open. Tried another set of fresh batteries to be presented with the same situation. Any advice / suggestions? I'm tempted to just return it and seek a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Chong

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent trash can. Quiet, smooth and quick. And the chocolate brown goes with my kitchen cabinets and floor. Met all of my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it's very nice, but doesn't like LED lights
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to randomly open - we were able to narrow it down to being caused by our LED lights in the kitchen. Very frustrating...
customer_reviews.author: Kristian D. Guntzelman

customer_reviews.title: Oh, Dear -- I'm Love With a Trashcan
customer_reviews.text: I know, I know! It's crazy to be in love with a trash can, but I am. This thing is just great! Smooth, quiet, sleek -- and the semi-round shape and footprint (size) was critical to where it could fit in my small kitchen! And the matching bag liners are completely awesome too. Now, you are talking to someone who, for years, never used a real trash can and only relied on loose grocery shopping bags for their trash. I didn't know what I was missing! I got it in stainless and I know they make the copper/rose color too. But sure would love to see it offered in a VERY SUBTLE Brushed-Gold color to match my kitchen hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshrimpy

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: I can say I have been nothing but disappointed since buying this. The sensor has a mind of its own and works when it wants but I could work with that. Now the gears in the motor have stopped working and the lid won’t open at all. If I wanted a trash can that I wanted to open manually I would of bought something a hell of a lot cheaper!!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: poor motor
customer_reviews.text: after returning the first can I got the second one which has just started having the same issue as before, being that the lid will not fully shut. for such an expensive trash can i would not recommend. this problem just happened to occur a few days after the return window so lucky me..
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly even though gently treated and not often used.
customer_reviews.text: Owned it for only 12 months, at a vacation house so seldom used, but it doesn't work. When the kid tries to open it just pops. Why did I get an electric machine? Next time I'll get step operated. Also, the strangely-sized Simplehuman bags are too small, annoying and expensive compared to what you find at the store. After this purchase, I would avoid this trash can, any electrically-activated can, and Simplehuman.
customer_reviews.author: averagebuyer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and elegant design, but motion sensor stopped working ...
customer_reviews.text: Sleek and elegant design, but motion sensor stopped working after only 5 months!! Replacing the batteries did not fix the issue. Product not worth the price given its lack of durability.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work longer than a year
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the sensor can in 2017. After about a year it stopped working. Customer service made several suggestions but changing the batteries and cleaning didn't work. The sensor and/or motor were dead. Customer service sent a replacement and I sent the old can back via a provided ups label. Sadly the replacement can also died after a year in the exact same way. This is a great concept but overpriced and poorly executed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10 months and done with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this can in August of 2016. Have replaced the batteries no less than 4 times in 10 months. If you casually walk by it, it opens. If you walk right up to it waving body parts, it's about 50/50. Unreliable I guess is the best word, and now it suddenly just stopped working altogether again (replaced batteries <2 weeks ago). I was willing to pay for the convenience, but it's junk. If you open the entire lid and just think you'll use it that way, the trash bag has nothing to hold it at the top. So now I'm looking for a new garbage can again, which should be an every 10 year thing, not 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: bkp

customer_reviews.title: Stock up on AA batteries...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for kitchen. But beware that it goes through batteries pretty fast and it takes 4 AA batteries. I've already had to change the batteries it came with and it's only been a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Lavelle R

customer_reviews.title: Not durable - Broke after 16 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in June 2016 and it worked well for 16 months. Suddenly the lid stopped working - it no longer opens automatically. I also do not like that other brands of bags do not fit well. I will not buy another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: RC748392

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed!
customer_reviews.text: In exactly 11 days this trash can has ran through a pack of batteries. I bought it on Feb 13 but unpacked it on Feb 16 and inserted the new pack of batteries that came inside the box. I bought the white one which looks very sleek and stylish but if this is going to be the case of changing batteries every 11 days it is not worth it. I will give it another try, so today, I put a new set of batteries and will wait how long it takes for them to drain.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthy

customer_reviews.title: the batteries pop out and make it seem like they're dead and need to be changed
customer_reviews.text: Sone quirks to note: the batteries pop out and make it seem like they're dead and need to be changed. Instead, swap them to different positions and they will work again. Another tip, don't let anything touch the lid from the inside. I think this triggers the sensor and exhausts the battery. Just remove the debris that's touching the lid and wait a while. The sensor and lid will work again.
customer_reviews.author: e.l.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect... Missing liner holder
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed that the trashcan didn't include the liner holder it stated that it was supposed to, but other than that the trash can does exactly as it stated it would do... and it looks just as nice in person as it does online. The best feature IMO, is how it waits for you to leave before it closes & even if you walk away and it starts to close, if you return it begins to reopen. This really helps because sometimes you just need a little longer than most sensors would've allowed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: The trashcan is nice and works well, but don't expect it to hold up to lite abuse.
customer_reviews.text: Initially we loved the trashcan and found the sensor to be responsive and the bags easy to replace. The problem arose when changing a bag that was overly full causing the can to lift up slightly off the floor and when the bag came loose the can tipped over. No big deal.... except the can is now out of alignment with the lid so it does not close fully and it is not obvious where the "damage" is at to try and get things lined back up. The lid is open enough that odor can escape making for a less then idea experience.
customer_reviews.author: AionAegis

customer_reviews.title: Batteries no longer last as they did
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in July 2016. Placed it in the pantry. It is hard to find a location where it doesn't open unintentionally when reaching for something on a shelf. Installing batteries is expensive and awkward. Now battery life seems much shorter than at first. An AC adapter would be helpful but apparently not available. We bought the can after seeing a similar one at our son's house. Recently noticed he has replaced it with a step can.
customer_reviews.author: CDR Oso

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can but consistency in product is off...
customer_reviews.text: I love this trashcan. Unfortunately it has been plagued with a couple issues since ive gotten it. The first one was perfect except it had a dent on top. The second one i got after returning the first has no dents but the sensory distance is less sensative than the first one i got and the shape of the lid seems to be ever so slightly morphed. For such an expensive trashcan, i wish there was more consistancy in the product. At this point i am too tired to return it again for a new one
customer_reviews.author: Tytus

customer_reviews.title: Good can but....
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I love this trash can. It's look is great, every which way they designed it is fantastic to look at and has a premium feel. But the issue for me is that it went through two packs of batteries in less than a month. That's 8 whole batteries drained!! I'm dropping stars because its very clear I'm going to need the adapter for this. Edit: contacted simplehuman and they sent me a replacement. So far so good. Great can, wish it can be power adapted though.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is cleverly designed, with a place in the can for a pack of bags. Also, love the hands-free aspect; the can stays clean. Easy to change the bags, and when you walk by the can it opens its lid, kind of like a friend acknowledging you! Silly, we know!
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: The sensor is quite nervous and will open the trash can if we walk by. Other than that it's great. The lid opens smoothly and quietly. The finish, like other Simple Human products is great. Glad 13 gallon trash can liners fit nicely too.
customer_reviews.author: DanielE

customer_reviews.title: Clean look to it and if you love to cook and have busy hands, this is for you!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for two years already and still love this trash can. It takes batteries and so you have to keep extra's on hand - bc you will want it to keep opening when you wave your hand over itLOL I have gotten so used to it , i wave my hand over other garbage can lids thinking "why isn't it opening?!!" oh duh. lol
customer_reviews.author: City Cinderella

customer_reviews.title: Repeating Another Review: Worked Well, Until It Didn't
customer_reviews.text: It was nice having a trashcan with a sensor. Like other buyers experienced, the trashcan would work intermittently, having you think it is your batteries, or maybe it needs to be cleaned. Now it's just a pretty trashcan and we have to lift the lid. Thought about attaching a drawer pull to the top until I replace it altogether. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: I. P. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Excellent simplehuman trash can
customer_reviews.text: Like this item very much - it is our second version of this product and it has been nicely improved. We were happy with our original black can, but like this much better and it is more attractive. A nice added feature is a trash bag dispenser attached to the back of the can under the battery area. This is a fine use of this dead space and very practical.
customer_reviews.author: Richard McDougall

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash can! Is a great size and won’t take much space in your kitchen. Is very easy to clean and you can’t really see finger prints all over. The only thing is battery, the battery won’t last much time. I find myself changing batteries monthly.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy09

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine for 6 months then all of a sudden just ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for 6 months then all of a sudden just stopped. The light still lights up, there's new batteries but that's it. 6mount maximum use. So basically I paid $10 a month to use it... but there are better ones out there
customer_reviews.author: A. Perelion

customer_reviews.title: Sensor worked for 5 days...  ; (
customer_reviews.text: We got a new place at the beach, and we were excited to have a SIMPLE HUMAN Automatic Sensor Trash can. The sensor operated fine for 5 days and then it NEVER worked again. I even had my "Tech Savvy" son try to figure it out, but I guess we got a Lemon. We changed out the batteries 3-4 times...still nothing. Sad, it's the most we have ever paid for a "Trash Can". It looks nice, it's sturdy....but we have to keep it propped open which defeats the purpose for the Sensor.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Amazing battery life!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this trash can for one and half years and this is our first time changing the batteries and we use it in non stop. At the beginning we were very scared we would be spending so much money on batteries but 4 AA batteries every one and half years is amazing. My mom bought a cheaper version of this and she has to change the batteries every 2-3 months. She probably already spent the amount of money she had originally saved on pure batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Batteries run out every couple of weeks and the sensor is unreliable. I’ve had it for 2 years and regretted the purchase every two weeks. I’m finally upgrading to a foot pedal.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: It is kinda annoying if you walk by it goes up And I ...
customer_reviews.text: It is kinda annoying if you walk by it goes up And I wish it would have a plug I feel I’ll be replacing batteries a lot
customer_reviews.author: jordan kirk

customer_reviews.title: No more fingerprints!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a little while but have to say, so far, love it. Allot for a trash can but, for me, well work it. I despise fingerprints and smudges on stainless. The auto open eliminates that. Works well, quiet. Didn't think I would but ordered a supply of their bags. Comes with a sample supply and really like them more than the stretch bags we were using.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Spires

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Automatic lid works great. Handy bag dispenser inside, and easy access to battery box on rear. Well made. Love it! But don’t walk too close to it, or you’ll have un-needed openings.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel, Bellevue, WA

customer_reviews.title: Makes doing household trash easy and -- dare I say "FUN!!"
customer_reviews.text: We all love the new trash can.... who knew you could love a "Trash Can ?!?!?!" lol - Very Happy with purchase :-)
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Great Garbage Can With Rear Storage
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Looks awesome, sensor works great and even has storage in rear to hold garbage bags. Batteries included. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond 3rd

customer_reviews.title: Nice trashcan very very very expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trashcan built very well but I am still kicking myself for paying the price I did for it. It is a very expensive garbage can. I actually thought it was an automatic open lid garbage can but ended up being a step can
customer_reviews.author: Nor

customer_reviews.title: clean and easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up - just added batteries and the trash bag and it was ready! Perfect for hands-off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful Battery life
customer_reviews.text: It works great, but the battery life is horrid for this type of appliance. Youll have to change them every couple months. I had a much cheaper "generic" brand of auto trash can that lasted over a year before having to change.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This can is very functional but drains batteries quickly. Got canned
customer_reviews.author: Bubbagum

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to empty trash, and easy to replace trash bag. No leak bags prolongs trash can cleaning intervals.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: As Promised
customer_reviews.text: I've had hands free sensor trash cans for twenty or more years now. I normally just buy them from SAMS. But this time my wife and I thought we would try this simplehuman brand. It's awesome. So quiet and easy to clean. No messy battery compartment. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mongo

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Like the size and surprisingly more interior room than expected. Would recommend the liners when ordering
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Design and functionality.
customer_reviews.text: I know you might think this trash can is a little expensive, but it is so worth the money. From the sleek design to the ease of use and the functionality you can’t ask for better. I’m very happy with it and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Henry

customer_reviews.title: Works  as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I had this trash can for about 3 months and it works as advertised. I had no problems with it and I love the bronze color that I got. In my opinion it was worth the money I spent.
customer_reviews.author: derrick pollard

customer_reviews.title: I’m loving it
customer_reviews.text: Love my bin. I’ve no issue with this bin at all. Sensor work great, and I guess I’m a shorter guy so the height and angle all worked out for me. I can see someone that is 6’1 will have to bend a bit unless he/she have long arms.
customer_reviews.author: KENO

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy lid
customer_reviews.text: Lid broke in less than a year. Not real happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeQueen

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. The functionality of the bags are great! But the lid does open a bit slowly for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Filipe B Dias

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Value &Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I love when you buy something online and it matches the picture in yr head!!! #amazingtrashcan #beautifulpresentation Yes it costs more but it is worth every$
customer_reviews.author: Beans

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This auto opening trash can is awesome! LED blue light on the lid when the can opens helps when the lights are off in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: G Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful but batteries need to be changed frequently. It also stopped working after one year. Disappointing for an expensive trash can. I’m hoping customer support will help me or it will be a big mistake spending this much.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Patel

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash can! I had searched lots of brands but was always hesitant to buy one! I am grateful that I bought this one! It works just like I would like for it to work!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Walker

customer_reviews.title: Love my trash
customer_reviews.text: I love my trash now because I don't have to touch the can. I am so happy I spent the money on this trash can. Well worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree

customer_reviews.title: The house guests love to play and dance with it
customer_reviews.text: I should have trusted the review of smell and it opens every time you walk by. The house guests love to play and dance with it. It opens a second too late so it makes a mess when the garbage drips...
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Could someone from simplehuman explain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for now slightly over 14 months. It stopped working 2 weeks ago. I have no idea why it stopped working. The sensor part supposed to have blue light lit up when it tries to open. But now it shows some obscured red lights. Battery changed new too. Have no idea why is that so. Very disappointed. Could someone from simplehuman explain?
customer_reviews.author: DisappointedCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. No sound virtually when it opens
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is amazing. It came with batteries and a sample pack of trash bags. My biggest issue with it is the fact that the trash bag isn't completely hidden, but that isn't a big deal at all. I probably just need to figure out how to place them just right.
customer_reviews.author: Tabithia Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 13 months and now completely dead
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 13 months and now completely dead. Tried fresh batteries, top notch batteries and nothing. $150 for 13 month.
customer_reviews.author: Noopy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you wipe down the sensor as debris can confuse it.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Vida

customer_reviews.title: Love the hands free trash can
customer_reviews.text: The trash can has meet our expectations. Appreciate no longer struggling to open the trash can when your hands are full. The one draw back is that the lid inadvertently raises if you walk too close to the can. We repositioned so to reduce the number of times it goes up by accident. The battery life is reasonable (have yet to change in the 4 months since purchased). We also use the recommended trash can liners and they fit well and are sturdy. I would buy again. Update. Changed my rating given the motion sensor/motor died after 2 years of use. Could not repair.
customer_reviews.author: akgjenkintown

customer_reviews.title: As promised
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to manage trash. Works like a charm every time.
customer_reviews.author: hsyedmd

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Trashcan
customer_reviews.text: Awesome trashcan! Holds way more than it looks. A classy addition to any kitchen and quite as well. I have two. The new one is even better since it takes AA instead of C batteries. It never opens up when I walk by. Funny, you'll catch yourself waiving at other cans around the house expecting them to open. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey for my taste but it's a very good trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Bob K

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 3 Itouchless garbage cans. I liked the idea of not having to touch the lid. It worked well for a time, but closed too fast, and towards the end of its life, wouldn't open properly. Much cheaper than my new can, the 'simplehuman'. So far, I love the look of this new can over the itouchless. It has the same delay to open as the itouchless, but most important advantage: It STAYS OPEN for you to use the can as long as you need, and closes when you move away, unlike the itouchless, which closes after a few seconds very annoyingly. Hope this new can lasts.
customer_reviews.author: beverly

customer_reviews.title: this is the best and last trash can I will buy
customer_reviews.text: I know, I know, so expensive for a trash can however, this is the best and last trash can I will buy. Extremely quiet & love the trash bags stored in the back of can. Very convenient & you can fold your own bags and put them in the back of can. Very, very happy with this simplehuman purchase as I have been with any simplehuman purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Burke

customer_reviews.title: It is the best trashcan. It uses 4 Batteries
customer_reviews.text: You must have it!! It is the best trashcan. It uses 4 Batteries AA
customer_reviews.author: Erick Aguilar Paau

customer_reviews.title: We like our Simplehuman trash can
customer_reviews.text: I like this simplehuman it does seem to open and stay open easier much better than our last one. Sometimes if you need it to open back to back it will have a delay in opening. It is easy to change the liner and easy to clean. I used the original liners that came with it and liked them but since have just been using regular garbage bag liners since I had a lot on hand. I would purchase another of these trash cans.
customer_reviews.author: Alan H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this trash can
customer_reviews.text: Love this trash can. I bought mine over a year ago and still works great with no problems. I have since then bought two more one for my mom and one more for my husbands mother and they both love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: We have had Simplehuman garbage cans for years
customer_reviews.text: We have had Simplehuman garbage cans for years, this one makes it super simple to use with the motion lid. You just have to be careful where you put it since it will open if you walk to close
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: I like the color and style
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and style, except every time I walk past it it opens. I wish it was able to tell if I were just walking past or throwing something away. Batteries will die much faster because of this.
customer_reviews.author: sonia

customer_reviews.title: Seems crazy to pay this much for a can, but...
customer_reviews.text: Great can! Sensor seems to be really good. The dark bronze hides dirt better than stainless. Good size, I had a slightly larger can before and don't see any difference in amount of times I take out the trash.
customer_reviews.author: ERoach

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: While this is pretty expensive for a kitchen trash can, it works quite well. I'm very happy with it. I have it next to a doorway in/out of the kitchen and it sometimes opens when I am just passing by, but that really isn't a bother. The included Simplehuman trash bags fit a little better than the regular store-bought bags, but I still use the less expensive bags from the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T

customer_reviews.title: Its great. never thought id spend this much on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Its great. never thought id spend this much on a trash can, but i cant deny it is a quality product. I wish the sensor was slightly more sensitive, but its silent, and works well enough.
customer_reviews.author: SpecialK

customer_reviews.title: but man I'm sure glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Someone else sold me on this line, and it's the truth!: "Can't believe I just spent $150 on a trash can, but man I'm sure glad I did. Best trash can I've ever owned. I'll never go back."
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Overall great. Opens well and the garbage bag is easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall great. Opens well and the garbage bag is easy to lift out without any vacuum effect, but it's quite sensitive and so opens even when you're just walking by in our small kitchen. Overall would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Schabram

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it... It is a little slow on opening, but I can live with that. It holds twice as much as my old can & I love that it closes automatically.....keeps garbage odors blocked.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Judith Bonfiglio

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy, and even the kids are better about throwing things away with the sensor top. We are very happy with the purchase. Guests have commented on it as well, and that rarely happens with a trash can!
customer_reviews.author: Jt

customer_reviews.title: Self Open
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is so much better than I expected. I has a sensor, so it opens up on its own so you don't have to touch it. Still using the trash bags it came with, so not sure if other "store" brand bags will fit it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is functionally amazing and a work of art
customer_reviews.text: This thing is functionally amazing and a work of art. Every detail has been thought three and the five year warranty is what sealed the deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Sharp-looking, hands-free container
customer_reviews.text: What a treat to have easy access for kitchen garbage in a lovely container. You can believe the product description in appearance and operation.
customer_reviews.author: cedar

customer_reviews.title: I love this little trash can.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trash can and I love having the bags right in the inside compartment. Makes for a very quick change when bags get full.
customer_reviews.author: PWtlc

customer_reviews.title: This item came with corroded batteries installed the description said ...
customer_reviews.text: This item came with corroded batteries installed the description said brand new with damaged packaging. Obviously this item was used!
customer_reviews.author: John A. Durante

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my mom on Mother's Day and yes ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my mom on Mother's Day and yes it's a little smaller than her old one but it's so much easier to get the bag out.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I do like the finish on the outside
customer_reviews.text: It works well. I do like the finish on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: M Hyatt

customer_reviews.title: Beauty in trash
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful can, seems very well made and functions perfectly. I really like the inside bag storage.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: great! (expensive)
customer_reviews.text: great product, though super expensive. simple human is typically great & expensive. :)
customer_reviews.author: adamwonders

customer_reviews.title: So make sure you have good batteries on hand
customer_reviews.text: The batteries that came with the trashcan didn't last very long - not even a week. So make sure you have good batteries on hand. :)
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved this can
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this can. Although pricey, it was fantastic. Unfortunately, when the lid opened, it hit the top of the counter I had it sitting under.. It would then stay stuck with the battery trying to operate. I tried it other places in the kitchen but it was in the way. I'm very sad to have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great trash can, works like its suppose to and hasn't faulted yet.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!  Garbage bags are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This works awesome! I love having the bags right there. We were worried our dog would be in it all the time as she's the right height to trip the sensor, but it closes at just the right time.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long to get this? He is my new friend. I named him Rollie.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, love the shape
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, love the shape ; it fits well against wall. Color is great with oil bronzed hardware. easy to clean and set up in a few minutes.

customer_reviews.title: I know this is very pricey for a garbage can. But I love it
customer_reviews.text: I know this is very pricey for a garbage can. But I love it. You do not have to touch anything. It's greast.
customer_reviews.author: Carla C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Works perfectly and a really nice thing to ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome . Works perfectly and a really nice thing to show off . lol
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto diaz

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Product and Looks Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is so beautiful. Fits trash compactly and comes with complimentary package of sturdy custom fit simplehuman trash bags. With a simple wave of the hand in front of the sensor, the lid will open. My only issue is that the can will open when I'm simply walking by it. This is likely due to my placement of the trash can as I have to walk within 1-2ft of it in my small apartment kitchen. Otherwise, I have no complaints and have had a great experience with it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this trash can
customer_reviews.text: Never knew I could love a trash can so much. The hands free lid works so organically that when I go use my friends trash cans, I just wave at it like an idiot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HANDS FREE TRASH CAN
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size can for our kitchen, very sanitary looking and so much better than anything else we've ever tried.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product... if only they had something more economical. But I love the convenience of it.

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a power option so it could be plugged in. Sensor is a little slow to respond and you have to get close. The true test will be how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: I have had many sensor garbage cans that don't open all the way and last ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had many sensor garbage cans that don't open all the way and last for a year. this can is great!! opens all the way!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, responsive, convenient, and never have problems with it closing on me. It's a little pricey though.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Forman

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I had a NineStar can before. This one is smoother operating, has a larger opening for the trash, and stays open as long as you stand in front of it. If it lasts, it is well worth the price difference,
customer_reviews.author: Annette

product_meta.title: simplehuman 45 Liter Semi-Round Automatic Sensor Trash Can, Brushed Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Color:Brushed Stainless Steel| Style Name:Trash CanThe simplehuman touch-free semi-round sensor bin opens automatically with just a wave of your hand so throwing rubbish away is quick, efficient and hassle-free. It has a motion sensor that is smart enough to adapt to you and the surrounding environment – no false triggers, no unexpected lid closures. This bin also features our innovative 'liner pocket,' which stores and dispenses liners from inside the bin for a faster liner change. The liner rim lifts up for easy access to the liner, then closes to grip and keep it neatly out of sight. An invisible nano-silver clear coat protects stainless steel from fingerprints and germs. The simplehuman code J liner refill packs store perfectly in this bin's liner pocket.

BRAND STORY
We design tools that help people become more efficient at home.

Day to day life has room for improvement. That's the basic thinking behind simplehuman. Many activities in our daily routine are so basic that we take them for granted. Washing our hands, cleaning up after a meal, grooming and prepping our appearance. Through innovation and new technologies, we find ways to streamline these simple tasks. We call our products tools for efficient living.
feature_bullets: 5-YEAR WARRANTY - We use the best materials and solid engineering so our products will last in tough environments like your home — for years
CODE J CUSTOM FIT LINERS – Enhance your trash experience with extra-strong and durable trash bags that fit this can perfectly for a cleaner trash experience
JUST WAVE YOUR HAND - Infrared fields sense the areas above and in front of the can so it opens effortlessly and automatically
LID OPENS SMOOTHLY - A planetary gear system transfers speed to torque for smooth, consistent lid operation
WHISPER-QUIET - At 52 db, our can is 50% quieter than the competition's
LINER RIM - Flips down to hide and secure liner
FINGERPRINT-PROOF COATING INFUSED WITH AGION - an EPA-registered antimicrobial agent proven to inhibit the growth of bacteria, fungi, mold, and mildew on our stainless steel surfaces
ENERGY EFFICIENT - Lasts up to one year using 4 AA alkaline batteries
